articles.title: How NBC News verified video of Ukraine plane allegedly hit by missile
articles.description: NBC News verified video that appears to show the moment a Ukrainian passenger jet went down shortly after takeoff from Tehran, Iran, killing 176 people. NBC News’ Emmanuelle Saliba explains how our reporting teams were able to verify the video, captured from …

articles.title: The human toll of America's wars

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sen. Amy Klobuchar talks Iran crisis & 2020
articles.description: NBC News Road Warrior Vaughn Hillyard interviews presidential candidate Sen. Amy Klobuchar on the Iran crisis, impeachment, and her race for the presidency.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sen. Amy Klobuchar responds to Bloomberg staffing announcement
articles.description: Presidential candidate Amy Klobuchar responds to Bloomberg's announcement that his campaign team will continue to work through the general election even if Bloomberg loses the Democratic nomination.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sen. Bob Menendez: ‘There is no clear definition of what they consider immanent’
articles.description: Senator Bob Menendez, a top democrat on the foreign relations committee, talks with MSNBC’s Chris Jansing about his key takeaways from yesterday’s Senate Briefing on Iran.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Bloomberg to keep funding campaign to defeat Trump even if he's not the nominee
articles.description: Watch NBC's Josh Lederman join Stephanie Ruhle to discuss their exclusive reporting on 2020 contender Michael Bloomberg's potentially game-changing decision that could impact every Democrat running in 2020. Weighing in: Joel Payne and Noelle Nikpour.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: How the U.S.-Iran clash affects surrounding nations
articles.description: Chaos is still developing between Iran and the U.S. Washington Post columnist Brian Klaas joins Stephanie Ruhle to discuss who could actually be benefiting from all of this.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Fmr. U.S. Amb. To Iraq reacts to new U.S. sanctions on Iran
articles.description: MSNBC’S Chris Jansing talks with former U.S. Ambassador to Iraq, Douglas Silliman, and MSNBC’s Senior Foreign Affairs Analyst Brett McGurk, about the Trump administration's new sanctions on Iran.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 'Love will prevail': Marianne Williamson drops out of 2020 presidential race
articles.description: Long-shot 2020 candidate and self-help author Marianne Williamson dropped out of the 2020 Democratic presidential primary in a letter to supporters, saying she couldn’t win and didn’t want to stand in the way of a progressive getting the nomination.
